meanings.definition: Having a more pleasing or attractive shape.
meanings.sent1: The new dress made her look shapelier than ever before.
meanings.sent2: The model showcased the shapelier version of the outfit on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked shapelier with the extra layer of frosting on top.
meanings.sent4: The garden appeared shapelier after the gardener trimmed the bushes into elegant shapes.
meanings.sent5: The vase with the curved design looked shapelier than the plain one.

meanings.definition: In a more pleasing or attractive shape.
meanings.sent1: She danced shapelier than anyone else at the party.
meanings.sent2: The flowers arranged shapelier in the vase on the table.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out lazily, looking shapelier than usual.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed shapelier after the rocks were removed from its path.
meanings.sent5: The clouds moved across the sky shapelier than a graceful ballet dancer.
